languages.text: По экрану бегут бесконечные строки о критических ошибках — машинные духи впали в ступор и не отзываются на команды.
The screen is flooded with endless lines of critical error warnings. The machine spirits have gone into a stupor and are not responding to commands.
languages.original_text: По экрану бегут бесконечные строки о критических ошибках — машинные духи впали в ступор и не отзываются на команды.

traits.locale_text: The screen is flooded with endless lines of critical error warnings. The machine spirits have gone into a stupor and aren't responding to commands.
The screen is flooded with endless lines of critical error warnings. The machine spirits have gone into a stupor and aren't responding to commands.
The screen is flooded with endless lines of critical error warnings. The machine spirits have gone into a stupor and are not responding to commands.
The screen is flooded with endless lines of critical error warnings. The machine spirits have gone into a stupor and are not responding to commands.
The screen is flooded with endless lines of critical error warnings. The machine spirits have gone into a stupor and are not responding to commands.
The screen is flooded with endless lines of critical error warnings. The machine spirits have gone into a stupor and are not responding to commands.

languages.text: Zahllose kritische Fehlermeldungen laufen über den Bildschirm. Die Maschinengeister sind in Stumpfsinn verfallen und reagieren nicht auf Befehle.
languages.original_text: The screen is flooded with endless lines of critical error warnings. The machine spirits have gone into a stupor and are not responding to commands.

traits.locale_text: Zahllose kritische Fehlermeldungen laufen über den Bildschirm. Die Maschinengeister sind in Stumpfsinn verfallen und reagieren nicht auf Befehle.

languages.text: L'écran fait défiler des lignes sans fin de messages d'erreurs critiques. Les esprits de la machine sont plongés dans un état de stupeur et ne répondent plus aux ordres.
languages.original_text: The screen is flooded with endless lines of critical error warnings. The machine spirits have gone into a stupor and are not responding to commands.

traits.locale_text: L'écran fait défiler des lignes sans fin de messages d'erreurs critiques. Les esprits de la machine sont plongés dans un état de stupeur et ne répondent plus aux ordres.

languages.text: Un caudal interminable de mensajes de error inunda la pantalla. Los espíritus máquina han caído en letargo y no responden a los comandos que introduces.
languages.original_text: The screen is flooded with endless lines of critical error warnings. The machine spirits have gone into a stupor and are not responding to commands.

traits.locale_text: Un caudal interminable de mensajes de error inunda la pantalla. Los espíritus máquina han caído en letargo y no responden a los comandos que introduces.

languages.text: 屏幕上充斥着无数行严重错误警告。机魂已经失去了意识，对命令没有任何反应。
languages.original_text: The screen is flooded with endless lines of critical error warnings. The machine spirits have gone into a stupor and are not responding to commands.

traits.locale_text: 屏幕上充斥着无数行严重错误警告。机魂已经失去了意识，对命令没有任何反应。

languages.text: 画面には、重大なエラー警告が際限なく表示されている。機械精霊たちは昏睡状態に陥り、命令に反応しなくなっている。
languages.original_text: The screen is flooded with endless lines of critical error warnings. The machine spirits have gone into a stupor and are not responding to commands.

traits.locale_text: 画面には、重大なエラー警告が際限なく表示されている。機械精霊たちは昏睡状態に陥り、命令に反応しなくなっている。

languages.text: Ekran, bitmek bilmeyen kritik hata uyarılarıyla dolup taşıyor. Makine ruhları sersemlemiş hâlde, komutlara yanıt vermiyor.
languages.original_text: The screen is flooded with endless lines of critical error warnings. The machine spirits have gone into a stupor and are not responding to commands.

traits.locale_text: Ekran, bitmek bilmeyen kritik hata uyarılarıyla dolup taşıyor. Makine ruhları sersemlemiş hâlde, komutlara yanıt vermiyor.
